reviewText: I enthusiastically ordered the DVD after I read the authors text on why he put this course together. It sounded really good and I was also glad to give an unknown college graduate a chance to share his teaching skills. The author has unfortunately no idea what the art of teaching is about. The DVD is a complete disappointment. The mediocre sound quality is far from being the main problem... the author kind of shows what he would like to teach, but we're far from the world of professional instruction. This is basically like a free guitar lesson you see on YouTube and that you skip because you think it's bad...
